products.name: iPhone 14 Pro
products.description: The iPhone 14 Pro comes with a 6.1-inch ProMotion OLED display with 1-120Hz adaptive refresh rates, Dolby Vision, and a Face ID Dynamic Island that allows Apple to utilize an always-on display feature, which dims the lock screen similarly to an Apple Watch.

products.name: Pixel 7 Pro
products.description: The Google Pixel 7 Pro gets the premium treatment with a sharper curved edge display, more cameras and bigger battery. The Pixel 7 Pro looks premium compared to the matte-finished Pixel 7 even though the two smartphones share the same core hardware.

products.name: M1 Macbook Air
products.desc: Apple Macbook air with apple silicon
products.description: The M1 MacBook Air is a lightweight and powerful laptop from Apple that features the latest Apple-designed M1 chip, offering lightning-fast performance and longer battery life. With a stunning Retina display, Magic Keyboard, and Touch ID.

products.name: Playstation 5
products.description: The PlayStation 5 (PS5) is the latest gaming console from Sony, featuring advanced hardware and technology for immersive gaming experiences. It boasts lightning-fast load times, stunning graphics and visual effects, and a customized SSD for speedy game installations and streaming.

products.name: Airpods Pro
products.description: AirPods Pro are Apple's wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation technology. They feature a comfortable in-ear design with customizable silicone tips for a secure and comfortable fit.

products.name: iPad Pro
products.description: The iPad Pro is Apple's high-end tablet that offers powerful performance and advanced features. It comes in two sizes: 11 inches and 12.9 inches, and features a Liquid Retina display with ProMotion technology that offers smooth scrolling and high refresh rates.

products.name: Galaxy S21 Ultra
products.description: The Galaxy S21 Ultra is a high-end smartphone from Samsung, featuring a large 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with a resolution of 3200x1440 pixels. It is powered by the Exynos 2100 or Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor (depending on region) and comes with 12GB or 16GB of RAM, depending on the configuration.

products.name: Galaxy S21
products.description: The Galaxy S21 is a high-end smartphone from Samsung, featuring a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with a resolution of 2400x1080 pixels. It is powered by the Exynos 2100 or Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor (depending on region) and comes with 8GB of RAM.

products.name: Apple Watch
products.description: The Apple Watch is a smartwatch that offers advanced features such as health and fitness tracking, notifications, GPS, and cellular connectivity. It comes in a variety of styles and materials, and offers a wide range of apps and watch faces to customize your experience.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 5
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch is a smartwatch that offers advanced features such as fitness tracking, smartphone notifications, and Samsung Pay. It comes in a variety of styles and sizes, and offers a long battery life and a wide range of apps to customize your experience.

products.name: Gaming Mouse
products.description: A gaming mouse is designed for gamers and offers features such as programmable buttons, adjustable DPI, and customizable RGB lighting.

products.name: S128 Folding Mini Drone
products.description: A mini drone is a small and portable remote-controlled drone that can fit in the palm of your hand. It offers features such as a built-in camera, altitude hold, and automatic obstacle avoidance

products.name: GoPro Pole Mount
products.description: A GoPro camera is a compact and rugged camera designed for capturing action-packed moments. It offers features such as high-quality video and photo capabilities, waterproof design, and advanced features like HyperSmooth stabilization and TimeWarp

products.name: Pocket Tripod
products.description: A tripod is a three-legged stand that provides stability for a camera or other device. It's designed to keep the device steady and prevent camera shake during photography or video recording, and allows for precise framing and composition.

products.name: Google Home Mini
products.description: Google Nest Mini is a voice-activated smart speaker powered by Google Assistant. It allows you to control your smart home devices, play music, ask questions, and get news and weather updates hands-free, simply by using your voice.

products.name: Virtual Reality Handset
products.desc: HTC VIVE Pro Virtual Reality Handset
products.description: A virtual reality headset is a device that allows you to immerse yourself in a simulated environment using VR technology.

products.name: HP Pavillion x360
products.description: A foldable HP laptop is a highly portable and versatile device that can be folded in multiple ways, allowing it to function as both a laptop and a tablet. It offers features such as touch screen display, stylus support, and powerful processors.

products.name: Apple iPad
products.description: The Apple iPad 5th Gen is a powerful tablet that offers a 9.7-inch Retina display, A9 chip, 8-megapixel camera, and support for Apple Pencil. It provides a fast and fluid user experience, making it perfect for work, education, and entertainment.

products.name: Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: The Razer Chroma Bluetooth Speaker is a compact and portable speaker that offers 16.8 million customizable colors and immersive 360-degree sound for an unparalleled audio experience.

products.name: boAt Airdopes 131 Pro
products.description: The boAt Airdopes 131 Pro is a pair of wireless earbuds that offer powerful 13mm drivers, IPX4 water resistance, and up to 15 hours of total playback time with the charging case. It also features touch controls for easy access to music, calls, and voice assistants.
